words.prompt: Danger. Be aware of the danger. Danger.
Country. France is a beautiful country. Country.
People. Many people attended the event. People.
America. We live in America. America.
Because. I stayed home because I was sick. Because.
Wrist. I hurt my wrist playing tennis. Wrist.
Muscle. He strained a muscle in his leg. Muscle.
Million. The city has over a million people. Million.
Tomorrow. The meeting is scheduled for tomorrow. Tomorrow.
Unique. Each snowflake is unique. Unique.
Thumb. He hit his thumb with the hammer. Thumb.
Finger. She pointed her finger at the map. Finger.
Ear. I can't hear well out of my left ear. Ear.
Shoulder. He carried the bag over his shoulder. Shoulder.
Ankle. She twisted her ankle running. Ankle.
Pressure. Apply pressure to the wound. Pressure.
Forehead. He wiped the sweat from his forehead. Forehead.
Tongue. I bit my tongue while eating. Tongue.
Heart. The heart pumps blood through the body. Heart.
Against. He leaned against the wall. Against.
Beneath. The keys were beneath the papers. Beneath.
Brought. She brought cookies to the party. Brought.
Caught. The cat caught a mouse. Caught.
Famous. The actor is very famous. Famous.
August. My birthday is in August. August.
Either. You can choose either the red or the blue one. Either.
Enough. Do we have enough food? Enough.
Beautiful. The sunset was beautiful. Beautiful.
Dollar. The book costs one dollar. Dollar.
February. Valentine's Day is in February. February.
Castle. The king lived in a large castle. Castle.
Ancient. We visited the ancient ruins. Ancient.
Guess. Can you guess the answer? Guess.
General. He gave a general overview of the topic. General.
Journal. She writes in her journal every night. Journal.
Instead. Let's have tea instead of coffee. Instead.
Science. My favorite subject is science. Science.
Double. Please double check your work. Double.
Toward. He walked toward the door. Toward.
Niece. My niece is five years old. Niece.
Machine. The washing machine is broken. Machine.
Favorite. Blue is my favorite color. Favorite.
Flavor. What flavor of ice cream do you want? Flavor.
Again. Please say that again. Again.
Probably. It will probably rain tomorrow. Probably.
Course. We played on the golf course. Course.
Library. I borrowed books from the library. Library.
Jealous. He was jealous of his friend's new bike. Jealous.
Antarctica. Penguins live in Antarctica. Antarctica.
Mountain. We climbed the mountain yesterday. Mountain.
Europe. Paris is a city in Europe. Europe.
Climate. The desert has a dry climate. Climate.
